archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Initiate Party Revenue Share Determination
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Determine that a revenue share needs to be calculated for a party with whom revenue is shared.

properties.value: Initiate Party Revenue Share Determination identifies that a revenue share needs to be calculated for a party with whom revenue is shared. This can be done by assessing party revenue sharing agreements and the terms/conditions that state the time period for which revenue shares are determined for the parties involved in the agreement.
